memory_verse.label: Memory Verse
memory_verse.text: “For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through Jesus Christ.”-(John 1:17)

devotion.label: Insight / Reflection
devotion.text:
The Law of God is raw pure, perfect, but unbending. It tells us what is right and what is wrong without emotion or excuse. It exposes sin like a mirror shows every blemish. The law says, “Do this and live,” yet we often fail to do it.

But then came Grace the refining fire of God’s mercy through Jesus Christ. Grace didn’t cancel the law; it completed it. Grace took the raw edge of justice and refined it with love and forgiveness.
The law showed us our sin; grace showed us our Savior.

Where the law said, “You are guilty,” grace said, “You are forgiven.” Where the law demanded perfection, grace supplied the power to live in holiness.

The raw law reveals; the refined grace redeems.
Let us live in obedience to God’s truth  not by fear of the law, but by the freedom of grace.

quote.label: Today's Quote
quote.text: “The law tells me how crooked I am; grace comes along and straightens me out.”— D.L. Moody

prayer.label: Prayer
prayer.text:
Lord, thank You for Your holy law that shows me truth, and thank You for Your amazing grace that makes me whole. Refine my heart by Your mercy.
Help me to walk not by the letter that kills, but by the Spirit that gives life. In Jesus’ name, Amen.

conclusion.label: A Word to You
text: May your life be shaped by truth and softened by grace. The law may convict, but grace will always lift you higher.

recommended_book.label: Recommended Book
recommended_book.title: Grace Awakening
recommended_book.author: Charles R. Swindoll
recommended_book.quote: A refreshing call to live in the freedom and beauty of God’s grace
